subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals acquired outfielder Norichika Aoki from Milwaukee to be their leadoff hitter, which means the Brewers are poised to shift Ryan Braun to right field.
snippet: The Kansas City Royals acquired outfielder Norichika Aoki from Milwaukee to be their leadoff hitter, which means the Brewers are poised to shift Ryan Braun to right field.
